projects.name: Kuli project
projects.description: Kuli website made during the Hack Your Future graduation project.

projects.name: KittyChat
projects.description: A silly themed chat application for all your kitty cat chats, with emoji toggle drawer. Built with Express and socket.io.

projects.name: Delish Delights
projects.description: Have some left-overs in the fridge? Get some inspiration with the Delish Delight app and search recipes by ingredient. Built with Vue and the meal API.

projects.name: De Meyer
projects.description: Design of the whole website, interactive mockup in Adobe XD, made during internship. Further development done by Webit

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: Check out the weather by searching for cities all over the world, toggle the background images between some nice cityscapes or current weather view. Made with the Weather API and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Search for a Pokemon by ID, number or get a random one, toggle a cool opening and closing effect. Built with JS, PHP and the Pokemon API.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock
projects.description: A spin on the classic game, with some added if statements. Made with JS and Bootstrap.

projects.name: Reset Meal Guide landingpage
projects.description: A landing page promoting the Meal Guide from Reset, designed during my internship at Webit. Interactive mockup build with Adobe XD, further development was done by Webit

projects.name: Kuli project landingpage
projects.description: A landing page to promote our Kuli website made during the Hack Your Future graduation project.

projects.name: Reminder app
projects.description: Never lose track of your todos with this Reminder app, built with React and styled with Tailwind.

projects.name: Groevy
projects.description: Rebuilding the Groevy website to a onepager.

projects.name: Ergens Onderweg
projects.description: Design of the whole website, interactive mockup in Adobe XD, made during internship. Further development done by Webit
